variables.name: mDeviceOwnerCanGrantSensorsPermissions
variables.comment: Default to allowing control over sensor permission grants.

methods.name: public Builder setLeaveAllSystemAppsEnabled(boolean leaveAllSystemAppsEnabled)
methods.comment:
* Sets whether non-required system apps should be installed on
         * the created profile when
         * {@link DevicePolicyManager#provisionFullyManagedDevice}
         * is called. Defaults to {@code false} if not set.

methods.name: public Builder setTimeZone(@Nullable String timeZone)
methods.comment:
* Sets {@code timeZone} on the device. If not set or set to {@code null},
         * {@link DevicePolicyManager#provisionFullyManagedDevice} will not set a timezone

methods.name: public Builder setLocalTime(long localTime)
methods.comment:
* Sets {@code localTime} on the device, If not set or set to
         * {@code 0}, {@link DevicePolicyManager#provisionFullyManagedDevice} will not set a
         * local time.

methods.name: public Builder setLocale(@SuppressLint("UseIcu") @Nullable Locale locale)
methods.comment:
* Sets {@link Locale} on the device, If not set or set to {@code null},
         * {@link DevicePolicyManager#provisionFullyManagedDevice} will not set a locale.

methods.name: public Builder setCanDeviceOwnerGrantSensorsPermissions(boolean mayGrant)
methods.comment:
* Marks that the Device Owner may grant permissions related to device sensors.
         * See {@link DevicePolicyManager#EXTRA_PROVISIONING_SENSORS_PERMISSION_GRANT_OPT_OUT}.

methods.name: public Builder setAdminExtras(@NonNull PersistableBundle adminExtras)
methods.comment: * Sets a {@link PersistableBundle} that contains admin-specific extras.

methods.name: public Builder setDemoDevice(boolean demoDevice)
methods.comment:
* Marks the device as a demo device, see {@link Settings.Global#DEVICE_DEMO_MODE}. The
         * default value if unset is {@code false}.

methods.name: public FullyManagedDeviceProvisioningParams build()
